name: Verdict: The Great Rebellion of Imbibitor Lunae
desc: A verdict for the mastermind behind the Sedition of Imbibitor Lunae. This verdict has a huge impact on the future of Xianzhou.

volumes.title: Verdict: The Great Rebellion of Imbibitor Lunae
volumes.localTitle: Verdict: The Great Rebellion of Imbibitor Lunae
volumes.localDesc:
Dan Feng the sinner, embracing immorality and breaking the ban,
thieving immortality and inciting riot.
Both gods and man alike are enraged, such that none can grant repentance,
It is only right to execute justice and punish the guilty, in order to uphold order and peace.

However,
Taking into account his past merits, he shall be spared a heavy punishment,
Through molting shall he atone for his faults.
A never-ending exile far beyond public opinion.
With total interception across the whole dominion.
